unnormalised: Bara, tumi insurance-achem chintun asa, mhunn sangtaat, bara? Tem ek ashem vostu zaun asa je konnakuch bhugtan korunk *zaina*, punn soglleank *zay*. Khas korun Bharotant, zoim vostu vegim bodolonk xokta. Taka chinta – ek medical emergency, ek nisorgik aapatti, ek apghat sudhdha – heo vostu tumchem soglle financial planning ek loop-ant dakoita. Thoinch ek boro insurance policy yeta.
normalised: Barobar, tumi insurance vixim chintunk sodtat, kiteak? Tem ek vostu zaun asa zaka konnuch pois diunk soddona, punn dor ekleak ti gorjechi. Khas korun Bharotant, zoim vostu itleo lagim bodlunk xoktat. Tacho vichar kor – ek vaidyokiye achad, ek nesargik aapad, even fakt ek accident – heo vostu tumchea purnn arthik yevzonnek foddnnak marunk xoktat. Thaim ek bori insurance policy yeta.

unnormalised: Atam, thoinch *kitlench* option bhair asa, life insurance policy sarkem LIC-achem Jeevan Anand, health insurance plans, tumchea gaddi vo tumchea ghara khatir policies sudhdha. Soglleank vegllem korun vollkhonuch chavee zaun asa. Tumchea chacha vo bua sangta tem thonddon korun fuddem vochona; tumchem research kara! Policybazaar.com vo paisabazaar.com compare korunk check kara.
normalised: Atam, thoim tonnni options asat, jivit insurance policies koxim L-I-Cchem Jeevan Anand, bholaike insurance plans, even tumchea gaddyea vo ghara khatir policies. Soglleanchem antar somzop hem mahatvachem. Tumchea chacha vo bua sangtat tem bodlekuch korunaka; tumchem research korat! Policybazaar dot com vo paisabazaar dot com check korat compare korunk.

unnormalised: Eka secondak health insurance-acher uloya, khas korun medical care-acho kharch vaddoita mhunn. Mhaka Apollo Hospitals-antlean eka ixttachea appendicitis khatir ek bill dista – tem sahajikponnan Rs. 80,000 aslem! Ek boro health insurance policy tea kharchacho aadhar divonk xokta. AIIMS ani Max Healthcare sarkhea vhoddlea hospitals-ant cashless treatment dita tea policies-ak sodun kadd. Pre-existing conditions vishim fine print vach, punn. Thoinch lok trip zata.
normalised: Amchea sangata bholaike insurance vixim ek second uloiant, khas korun vaidyokiye sambhallachi kimot vaddtat tea sangata. Mhaka lagimuch Apollo Hospitalsantle ek bil dislem eka ixttachea appendicitisak – tem soppaiekuch rupiye assi hozar aslem! Ek bori bholaike insurance policy ti kharchik porge korunk xokta. Policies sodhat je major hospitalsancher cashless treatment offer kortat jem A-I-I-M-S ani Max Healthcare. Pre-existing conditionsacher barik lipi vachat, punn. Thaim fuddari adta.

unnormalised: Magir life insurance asa. Tem tumchea vishim na, khorench; tem tumchea familik rakhunk asa tumkam kitem ghoddlem zalear. Life insurance veg-vegllea prakaran asa – term life, whole life, endowment policies... Hanv tumkam details-ancher bore korcho na punn tem mat vollkhon ghe ki term life insurance sahajikponnan kharchik asta ani ek nirdisht samayak aadhar dita, sangata, 20 vorsank.
normalised: Ani jivit insurance asa. Tem tumchea vixim nõi, khorench; tumchea familik rakhop dita zori tumkam kitem-i zata zalear. Jivit insuranceacheo veg-veglleo prakar asat – term life, whole life, endowment policies... Hanv tumkam detail dil’lean kantall korina punn tumi zannat ki term life insurance soppaiekuch cholta ani ek khas periodak coverage dita, sangata zalear, vis vorsam.

unnormalised: Gaddi insurance zay mhunn asa, kaydeachem mhunn sangataat, punn tem tumkam financial liability-antlean rakhunk important sudhdha tumi apghat kortat zalear. Ek lhan fender-bender sudhdha Rs. 10,000 vo odik repair bills zoddunk xokta. Tumchem policy third-party liability-ak aadhar dita mhunn nischit kara; tum maka uprant dhanyvad ditat.
normalised: Gaddi insurance ek zai asochi vostu asa, kanun pramanent, punn tem tumkam arthik zabadarechea rakhopantui maha-mahatvachem zaun asa zori tumi ek accident zata zalear. Even ek lhan fender-benderui rupiye dha hozarchi repair bills rakhunk xokta. Thachi khatri korat ki tumchi policy third-party liability porge korta; tumi mhaka uprant dhanyavad ditole.

unnormalised: Ghar insurance-ak sarkhem lok doxi dita, punn tem keedak lagchem, khas korun tumi pural vo bhum kamp zata tea area-ant jietat zalear. Chennai-chea pural 2015 ani Kerala-chea pural 2018-ant dakoilem ki tea nisorgik aapattim kitlo vinashkarak zata mhunn. Ek boro ghar insurance policy tumkam bandunk aadhar diunk xokta.
normalised: Ghar insurance chodd korun olkhinasan zata, punn tem favo asa, khas korun zori tumi eka areaan jiyetat zoim pur vo bhukamponacheo sombond zata zalear. Chennaiantle pur don hozar ani pandra ani Keralaantle pur don hozar ani athra dixttavon dakoitata ki heo nesargik aapadeo kitleo uzo divopacheo zaunk xoktat. Ek bori ghar insurance policy tumkam novean bandunk madad korunk xokta.

unnormalised: Ek tip hanv sodanch dita to mhunnlear veg-vegllea provider-ancher policies compare kara. Tumi pollelea poilek mat ravona. HDFC Life, ICICI Prudential Life, SBI Life Insurance-ak check kara. Reviews vach, kolem di ani veg-vegllea company-antlean quotes ghe. Bankbazaar.com sarkem websites compare korunk aadhar divonk xokta.
normalised: Ek tip hanv dor tem ditam ti mhunntlear veg-vegllea providersancher policies compare korat. Fakt tumi poilech dekhunachim ravonaka. H-D-F-C Life, I-C-I-C-I Prudential Life, S-B-I Life Insurance check korat. Reviews vachat, as-pasicheank vicharat ani anik companyanim quote gheiat. Websites bankbazaar dot com koxim compare korunk madad korunk xoktat.

unnormalised: Uprant, boro insurance policy tumchea zaru ani tumchea budget-ant bosta to. Tumchich insurance korona, punn thoddo insurance korona. Tumi nischit na zalear eka financial advisor-ak uloat. Te tumchea dhokeacho andaz gheunk ani tumchea ani tumchea familik sarkho coverage sodunk aadhar diunk xoktat. Tumchea xantichea monacher ek investment mhunn chinta.
normalised: Nidhanak, bori insurance policy ti tumchea gorjek ani tumchea budgetak fit zata ti. Chodd insurance korinaka, punn unnem insuranceui korinaka. Eka arthik salahakaran sangata uloiat tumi kallejit asat zalear. Te tumchea riksanchem mullyankon korunk ani tumchea ani tumchea familik favo ti coverage sodhunk madad korunk xoktat. Tem tumchea sushanti bhurgeakodde ek investment koxim chintat.
